This is an Unofficial Extension for the Frostcast Community/Network. 
With This Extension players can Access the forums in Seconds!
This replaces having to type in that pesky IP Address. This can connect you to the Voting System, Forum, stats of the server and more!
The future Updates will include The amount of People on the network and Performance Upgrades!

~By Doug And Jacob
